metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to include a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to include your device, triple click Tamper switch to include it in the network.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to exclude a device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to Exclude your device, triple click Tamper switch to exclude it from the network.
metadata.reset:
Press and hold Tamper switch for at least 3 seconds while you insert the battery. 
*Use this procedure only in the event that the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
